comments.comment: Japan Arc has started finally. Can't wait for the next episodes.
The absolute relief is 200% noticeable in the way Felix's is talking, in his emotion and facial expressions. So happy for this guy. 3 years of stress and frustration is starting to ease away.

Pewds few years ago: We wanted to live in a country like UK, so we can both understand the language and not be dependent on each other (referencing Pewds living in Italy and Marzia staying in Sweden)
Pewds now: We moved to Japan and we don't speak the language!

"It's evolving just backwards" indeed.
I don't watch regularly anymore, but I check in once in a while to see how ur doing since you were a big part of my childhood. I'm really happy for you Felix<3
flying a jet was the first rich RICH thing i saw pewds do
I'm so happy for you dude.

I teared up when you got a private jet just for your dogs. I can't even imagine taking my dog to a plane when i can't even leave her in front of a store.
Edgar and Maya deserve the best!!
Hi!!! こんにちは！Pewdiepieさん！How is Japan?? 🇯🇵
It’s insane watching this man go through so many stages of life over the years.
The fact he feels the need to explain himself about a private jet trip shows how cool of a guy he is and different from other wealthy people. You’re the best, bro.
haven't watched you in years' but i knew this would eventually happen...awsome stuff hope you and your family and the doggos a fun and happy life in japan 🇯🇵

you moved to japan to enjoy the life and culture there, we wouldnt ever expect you to keep the same workload of videos. you are an amazing youtuber and i think i speak for most of us here by saying you made our childhoods extra special. no matter how much you do/dont upload or even if you do decide to retire we will always be behind you felix. hope all is well!
You can just see how happy you are, congrats on the move man! Excited for this arc.

I’ve been a bro since I was 9 years old, and I’m turning 20 in a couple months. It is an indescribable amount of happiness that I am feeling for both Felix and Marzia, these two deserve nothing short of the best. Take care in Japan️ this is amazing!!!
The happiness in his eyes made me emotional. I wish Marzia and you and the lil doggos the best!!

Felix is explaining the choice of the jet like we wouldn’t all do it to make the journey easier for us and our pets if we could afford it. He’s a good guy for considering the pugs needs even if it was an extra expense
imma be real, haven’t watched pewds in a while and i haven’t seen him this happy in a long time! i’m so glad he’s doing what he wants in life :)
he seriously seems like he's about to cry of relief in this. it really warms my heart to see his happiness!!

“It just didn’t feel fair, risking my dogs health just because i want to move country” So heartwarming to me seeing pewds spend a ridiculous amount of money just to make sure his dogs were comfortable during the move, im so glad it all worked out

Pewds spending money on himself: time to shop on wish
Pewds for his dogs: private jet

I think it’s really nice that he cares so much about Edgar and Maya-it’s worth it for them to be safe on the journey imo. Plus after all the stress of the move, I’m glad Felix and Marzia were able to have a relaxing experience even for just a little while.
Its a blessing for us to have someone who is so transparent with their plans. It is good because many of us aim for what you are doing so it acts like a guide or a road map

I’ve been going through a lot of stuff lately and I haven’t really been feeling like myself. I saw this video pop up and I haven’t been watching you regularly for a couple years so I thought why not click it? Just seeing your face and hearing your voice again really grounded me, you made my childhood and I’m happy that now that I’m older I’m still able to relate to your content. I’m so happy for you finally getting to move even though I didn’t really know about it. Your words about how you never really know what happens in life really resonated with me. You’re an inspiration and an awesome guy and I really hope the best for both you and Marzia in the future. Thank you pewds, much love from Sweden :)
My goodness, he sounds so relieved. You can tell this is really what they want!

5:47 Pewds my dude. You're the first YouTuber taking a private jet as a last resort to ensure your dog's health and safety. Ain't no way we're gonna judge you for that. It makes me happy to see you guys were able to finally make it happen and it's an inspiration for us all to keep pursuing our dreams and goals. Bless you pewds and good luck with the Japan arc
I remember watching you as a kid and now im an adult trying to find my footing. Time really flies. So glad that the move was successful after years of waiting

Its so refreshing to watch this video. My husband and I want to move back to Korea so bad because its a place where we were the happiest, but it seems like everyone is just dragging us down about it, being negative. Its miserable in the US for us, we just want to go be happy again.

Even though this guy has been the king of YouTube for the last 12 years, he is still anxious to talk about using a private plane. And they mostly did it because it felt to be the right choice, considering all the things going on. I am privileged to follow such a humble man.

PS. Some Japan VLOGS would be awesome!

Welcome to Japan 🇯🇵 you two are going to love it here. 

And yes… the paperwork and rigid procedures for city hall, phones, cards, banking is intense  Prepare for  the phrase, “shoganai” which means “it can’t be helped” a common Japanese phrase when rules cannot be bent but they’re trying to politely to say, “nah brah, we can’t do that.”

Pewds has always had the biggest heart, from when I started watching him in 2014 till now he has always maintained his way being there for everyone, friends, family and fans. He’s an extremely genuine person and I want to wish him luck in his new lifestyle.
If the highest subbed creator didn’t take a private jet I’d be confused. Daily vids for 12 years. That’s a determined soul. Thanks for the content and good luck and enjoy it over there!!

As someone who was raised in a different country to my nationality, i cant help but think how rich in culture Felix's kids will be if they have any, growing up in Japan knowing Japanese, Swedish, English and Italian as primary languages, really great to see and im happy for them
The fact he brofists still just puts a smile on my face
It actually warms my heart seeing Felix and his family where they've wanted to be for so long. I can see it in his face, just congratulations
Excited for both of you to experience life here! ️
You just gave my wife and me hope that this is actually possible. Thank you Felix, have a great time in japan!

No matter how much less I watch Felix now. I always feel nostalgic and happy for him and his family when there’s a big change or event that positively changes their life. I’m happy for you Felix and I hope you do the best. Good luck with everything.
Still so stoked you finally got to make the move!
Watching this 2 years later and i'm proud of you and your journey, good work Felix and marzia, yall are amazing
Definitely feels like Felix edited this video.

Dude, you've been the biggest Youtuber for almost a decade, don't be so conscious about flying in a private jet, you've earned that right. Your fans all wish you the very best in the next chapter in your life.
I like how the Brofist came from being a staple, to a joke, to now being a sign of genuine feelings
Genuinely happy for you, Felix!  Congrats on the move!

As a vet student, I have so much respect for you putting your dogs health before your own conveniences. Those dogs have the best life thanks to you two. It feels sad that you had to explain that because most of us wouldn't have cared about you flying private regardless, but that is probably the best reason anyone could have to fly private jet lol. Looking forward to Japan content, and thanks so much for sharing the journey with us! <3

4:34 “if anything I want to keep making videos”

it’s awesome that 12 years later and Felix still wants to continue YouTube, what a mad lad, wish you all the best in Japan
It's so heart warming to see felix go though these stages in life

I'm so glad you guys made it and that you get to start this new adventure! 

I totally get it with the dog situation - One always does whatever one can to keep them as safe as possible. If one has the means, why not fly them in a jet? :)
Congratz to you and Marzia!! So happy for you!! You been so consistent through your time on youtube! U deserve to live life and enjoy! You are an inspiration!

I'm so happy and excited for you to be finally here!
日本語の勉強も頑張ってください！
I was smiling like an idiot at the beginning of the video. That's how happy I am for you Felix! Hope everything works out for you two

welcome to Japan!!
You may be going through a lot from now on, but I hope you enjoy your life here in Japan!!
I’m just glad Felix still wants to keep us around. I really hope we get to continue on with his journey through all this with him.

It’s so crazy that I started watching Felix back when I was in 6th grade when I was like 11, and now i’m literally 20 about to be 21 this is such an amazing thing to see someone grow and do so well in life that has brought me so much joy growing up.
I'm excited about the collabs with other creators in Japan, it's gonna be gooood

the fact that you and Marzia made it through the covid frustration, to THAT kind of level specific to your life...... that is solid proof of a strong relationship.  I love you two and I am so happy you made it!
Damn this made me emotional...coming from your bro era, seeing how far you`ve come with everything you do...I wish you all the best and I`m super excited for whats to come for you guys!

Honestly this channel's about to get a massive turn, and i'm honored to have lived through the prologue, ascension, highest peak and its relaxed time, having seen all the ups and downs, dramas and laughs, i feel like i shared a life which wasn't mine, like the longest anime
Your development from watching you in a kitchen playing horror games to you getting married and moving to Japan. Brings a tear to my eye. Extremely happy and excited to see where you go.
Finally, the best YouTuber in Japan! Cheers from Kobe! Yay
I like how he keeps his audience updated with these little vlogs. I personally love them
Felix isn't the social media figure we deserve, but he's the one we need. <3
This really feels like Felix can take bit of a breather. This man deserves this, he’s grown so much and has become so humble. I can’t wait to see where this takes them

I'm in the middle of having to make a difficult moving decision, and having my favorite youtuber give me advice about it after successfully doing it, acknowledging it's scary and there's always a sacrifice and compromise you have to make sometimes. Pewds acknowledging "saying goodbye is part of the journey" and his whole documentation of the process has really been helping me deal with my own life decisions and problems. Thank you Pewds for always being gamer style risk taker, you're my role model and you've helped me so much in my life. I am so happy you did your dream move. It's inspiring as heck, gamer
brofist
Pewdiepie 2034: we're moving to Norway!
I absolutely admire you for taking your dogs with you. If it takes a jet, it takes a jet. Being with family is priceless.
I’m excited to see your Japanese language progress as you’re studying here.
i watched you grow up from being at a bad job to you getting your dream job dude. i know a lot of people will say i miss the old felix but they need to understand everyone changes in life.
Congrats bro! Doing everything right, enjoy Japan!

You can tell how humble he is solely by the fact he’s explaining why he took a private jet one time even with his status. I’m glad I got to spend the last decade watching pewdiepie become who he is today
Congrats on making it there from the whole team! Can't wait to see you react to this video solely in Japanese 5 years from now. :P

i didn't check your channel for a long time ,but now because i moved to another country to study i felt somehow lonely, i started a pewdiepie marathon to cheer and it really helped me. im so happy for you you achieved a hard goal, as many people i understand how hard the situation is , so i don't blame you if upload rate decreased .sorry for long message but im really happy for you.hope you do well bro

Hi Felix! Yes you're right! I've lived in Japan my whole life and love it here! You're right, it's not the perfect place, but  most important part is YOU enjoy it! Take things one day at a time and you will surely adapt and enjoy life here! I'm so excited to see you immerse yourself into the land of henta... anime!!! Please come to Osaka and try our famous octopus ballz!!
It's weird how he even felt the need to explain his decision to move to Japan to the people telling him all the bad things about it, Felix just wants to live life. Such a positive vibe <3.

This channel feels less like a YouTube channel, and more like a family that we are all apart of. Seeing Felix finding happiness in his own ventures is far greater than any normal content upload. We will always support your endeavors Pewds!!!! <3

日本に来てくれてありがとうございます！！

Thank you!!  Living Japan!!

I like how from just a sometimes funny guy i watched sporadically, at this point i feel like i'm checking up on a friend, even if thats not how it is, i'm happy for you man, you are one of the very few i care about.

Can’t believe I’ve watched this man grow for a decade, I’m happy for him and Marzia. He’s inspired me in many ways and I know he won’t be making videos for the rest of his life. But it’s nice to see him and Marzia happy journeys, cheers to you Felix! Thank you and congratulations!!!!

I’m glad Felix is happy. I grew up watching this man, and every time my life has gotten too hard, I’ve always watched his videos until I knew life was going to get better. Have a wonderful time in your new country!
こうやって有名人が日本に来るってめっちゃうれしい
Felix has came along way since the start of youtube!
After everything PewDiePie has done for me and everyone else it’s good to see him happy

Man it's crazy to think I'm 23 this year and to have been there every step of the way through the rollercoaster ride of your life on YouTube. Congrats on the move and I hope you enjoy Japan. It's definitely on my top 2 places list that I want to visit. 

Bro fist
Been watching you since 2013 Felix. You’ve grown a lot over the years and it’s cool to see u doing what u want in life. Best of luck from a long time fan

You should be able to buy a Desktop with Chakubarai (pay on delivery), even off amazon. Just put down a friend's phone number, if you need help with that let me know.  Japan will definitely have a huge amount of teething pains in first few months setting things up, even resurrecting my old bank accounts and yahoo accounts etc. has been a massive pain in the a. Though seeing the amount of comments you have lol doubt you will even get to read this.

I love this. I came here once in 2013 for a month, Loved Japan and everything about the experience, and moved here permanently in 2016 after college. I had little money, No plan (outside of Language School), some (minimal) language ability, and just overall that same positive attitude for the future. I've built my entire career and life here in Japan, and wouldn't have it any other way.
Congratulations on the move bud! Hope ur lil family loves it. Sending some love and good vibes your way

Pewdiepie: Finally is in Japan.

Also PewDiePie: “Finding what else to do is my true enemy.”
As someone who lives fairly near to Brighton I always found it really cool knowing you were near by. Genuinely feeling kinda sad knowing you're now gone
Congrats Pewds you and Marzia deserve it you really do :)
If I could afford it, I would 100% be getting a private jet for my pets.

What a great time to be alive to witness pewds from 2011-2022, thanks 12 yrs of entertainment, im not expecting for a daily upload meta anymore you done a lot for 12yrs, go enjoy your life and just upload whenever you want.

Bro, been watching you since amnesia and I can honestly say this is the second happiest I've ever seen you, (first being your wedding of course!). You've been changing and growing as a person over the years so much. It's amazing. Thank you for being yourself with us. Thank you for sharing your experiences and life with us. I'm so excited for you and Marztia.

Im just so glad that he's actually really really really calm now like, just doing things he loves and enjoys, never stressing out about his yt uploads... The real ones will stay and i just wanna thank felix for uploading videos and also sharing your life journey w us. I enjoy his videos and also learn important life lessons from him.
Felix, I love how you just do what makes you happy and you don’t let what people say affect you. Have fun in Japan!

I started watching him 8-9 years ago, it’s crazy how things changed since, I’m really happy for this man, he was a part of a lot of people’s childhood including mine, and it feels like we kinda grew up together with him
honestly I’m really happy for pewds he made a great decision
As the “uk” chapter ends…a whole new “Japan” chapter has just started and I can’t wait to see what happens next!!!!
Started watching pewdiepie in 2014, I was 11 then. So happy to see this man make it so far in life
Man felix is finally being relieved at least a little. He deserves it

I actually moved to Japan just two months ago and I’m still getting used to everything. I’m so glad that Edgar and Maya made it safely with you guys too. AAAA this is so exciting and I can’t wait to be able to see some Japan vlogs AND THAT GHIBLI PARKS IS GONNA BE OPENED SOON TOO. お疲れ様でした
